WW_Relics:White_Boots.FLAVOR: Very, very worn shoes... as much from hitting as from walking.
DESCRIPTIONS: copies of it in the draw pile, then exhaust the Attack. Each copy cost

WW_Relics:Duffel_Bag.NAME: Duffel Bag
WW_Relics:Duffel_Bag.FLAVOR: Very practical when travelling. Someone left stuff inside...
DESCRIPTIONS: When you get it, receive [#2aecd7]1 Bandage Up, [#2aecd7]1 Panacea and [#ffff00]

WW_Relics:Fighting_Gloves.NAME: Fighting Gloves
WW_Relics:Fighting_Gloves.FLAVOR: "Inspiring! It gives you this feeling of wanting to improve yourself." - Ranwid.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upgrades outside of fights allow to upgrade

WW_Relics:Red_Headband.NAME: Red Headband
WW_Relics:Red_Headband.FLAVOR: Placing it in your head gives some focus against distractions.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, the first Status or Curse card drawn is discarded, then draw a random card from the draw pile, if there is any card there.
